abstract: MLB Roundup; Washington Nationals rally to beat Atlanta Braves, 13-12, marking biggest deficit comeback in franchise history; other baseball news noted.
lead_paragraph: Washington ended a seven-game losing streak with a 13-12 victory in Atlanta, overcoming an eight-run deficit twice.

headline.main: Dan Uggla’s Ninth-Inning Homer Rallies Nationals Past the Braves
headline.print_headline: Uggla’s Ninth-Inning Homer Rallies Nationals Past the Braves

snippet: Washington ended a seven-game losing streak with a 13-12 victory in Atlanta, overcoming an eight-run deficit twice.
